titles.title: Doraemon: Nobita to Mirai Note
ドラえもん のび太と未来ノート

anime.description: Note: Educational video produced by the New Energy and Industrial Technology Development Organization (NEDO) in 1994, it was later included on the 13th issue of Boku, Doraemon magazine released on August 20, 2004.
